dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1669 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Stop, Observe, Ask, and Respond to Health and Wellness Training Program.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cohen introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Stop, Observe, Ask, and Respond to Health and Wellness Training Program.

section.header: Reauthorization of the SOAR to Health and Wellness Training Program
section.text: Section 1254(h) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300dâ€“54(h)) is amended by striking fiscal years 2020 through 2024 and inserting fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
